name: Once upon a time
description: « Once Upon A Time » is an adventure game in which a young woman, finds a magic book and is instantly teleported inside. Each chapter of the book is one single tale in which you will have to solve riddles in fairy tale designed settings. Magic and nature will be friends and foes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 1.7 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 680 - Ati Radeon 7970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space
